entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
